snippet: Paul Volcker, Wall Street's octogenarian nemesis, weighed in on the Greg Smith affair on Wednesday, suggesting that regulation might stop the sort of conflicts that the executive said occurred at Goldman Sachs.
abstract: Paul Volcker, Wall Street's octogenarian nemesis, weighed in on the Greg Smith affair on Wednesday, suggesting that regulation might stop the sort of conflicts that the executive said occurred at Goldman Sachs.

headline.main: The Volcker Rule and the Goldman Controversy
